name: Wild Shooting Expert
description:
Take sniper guns, prove the best shooter in this master game. In this Wild Shooting Expert, you will face the most dangerous animals of the wild jungle. The jungle is a burst of wild animals so first, you have to improve your shooting skills

Features:
Addictive game play
Action packed missions
Smooth and steady controls
Realistic assault and killer rifles
Sniper scope views.
Real HD graphics
